disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Daredevil Impulse.

description.value: Innate - Style: Damaging basic attacks and abilities against at least one enemy champion different from the previous damaging hit made against them grants Samira a Style stack for 6 seconds, up to 6 stacks, refreshing on damaging attacks and abilities against enemy champions. The stack count is represented by the grades to the left of her health bar for Samira herself, and a stack counter underneath the bar that is visible to all units.

description2.value: Samira gains 0% − 21% (based on Style grade)  bonus movement speed.

description3.value: Innate: Samira's basic attacks against targets in 200 range use her blade, becoming non-projectile. Basic attacks on-hit within this range and Blade Whirl, Wild Rush, and the slash and explosives of Flair deal 2 − 19 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) bonus magic damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health).

description4.value: Additionally, Samira's basic attacks against immobilized enemies deal the attack's damage over 6 rapid attacks and knock up the target for 0.5 seconds. This causes her basic attack timer to reset and the attack to become unstoppable. If the target is not within  attack range, Samira will dash into it from a certain distance and then attack. This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every 10 seconds.

description5.value: The empowered attack can critically strike. On-hit effects are only applied once.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The previous hit will not be tracked while at 0 Style stacks. The bonus magic damage dealt with the blade is default damage. The attack against immobilized enemies is 6 instances of basic damage. The bonus damage does not apply to structures. Guinsoo's Rageblade's Phantom Hit and Runaan's Hurricane's bolts will not apply the bonus magic damage, since it is on-hit of specifically the melee attack casts. Attacks with the gun and blade do not count as different attacks for stacking Style. Basic attacks using the blade are still classified as ranged. Since the knock up requires an exterior source to immobilize the enemy, Aftershock will be swapped with Grasp of the Undying for Samira at the start of the game. Abilities blocked by spell shields will still grant Samira Style stacks. PENDING FOR TEST: Parrying effects interaction with empowered attack ( dodge, block, and blind).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Flair.

description.value: Active: Samira fires a shot in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it hits.

description2.value: If a targetable enemy is in front of Samira, she will slash with her blade instead, dealing the same damage to all enemies hit in a cone.

description3.value: Casting Flair during Wild Rush will cause Samira to deploy explosives along her path which detonate upon the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies within the covered distance. This can be done while performing Blade Whirl and Inferno Trigger.

description4.value: Flair can critically strike for (25% +  25%) bonus physical damage and both the shot and slash apply  life steal at full effectiveness.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Applies spell damage on the shot and area damage on the slash and explosives. The shot and the slash do not count as different abilities for stacking Style. The explosives do however. The explosives do not benefit from  life steal. Flair will cast from wherever Samira is at the end of the cast time. Samira will always cast Flair's slash in her facing direction, and she will turn to face the target direction at the start of the cast time. Flair can be buffered 0.5 seconds before it comes off cooldown. Flair deals 0 / 6.25 / 12.5 / 18.75 / 25 (+ 125% AD) physical damage when it critically strikes, increased to 0 / 7.5 / 15 / 22.5 / 30 (+ 150% AD) with Infinity Edge. The shot will be destroyed by projectile-intercepting effects. PENDING FOR TEST: Slash and explosives The explosive placement is illustrated in Wild Rush regardless of whether Flair is available. The indicator is always shown the same as the dash's distance even if Wild Rush does not accomplish its full range.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Blade Whirl.

description.value: Active: Samira slashes around herself twice over 1.25 seconds, the first slash occurring immediately and the second being performed 0.25 seconds before the duration ends, each one dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

leveling.value: Slash Damage:»20 / 35 / 50 / 65 / 80 (+ 80% bonus AD)«Total Damage:40 / 70 / 100 / 130 / 160 (+ 160% bonus AD)

description2.value: Samira destroys all hostile non- turret projectiles that enter or are in her vicinity during this time.

description3.value: Samira cannot attack nor cast Flair during Blade Whirl. Casting Inferno Trigger will end Blade Whirl early without performing the second slash.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Blade Whirl's area of effect is fixed around Samira. Blade Whirl can be buffered 0.5 seconds before it comes off cooldown. Each slash counts as different abilities for stacking Style. Spell shield will block the damage from one slash.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Wild Rush.

description.value: Active: Samira dashes in the direction of the target allied or enemy unit and slashes all enemies in her path, dealing magic damage and gaining  bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.

leveling.value:
Magic Damage:50 / 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 (+ 20% bonus AD)
Attack Speed:30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50%

description2.value: Takedowns on enemy champions reset Wild Rush's  cooldown.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Wild Rush can be buffered 0.5 seconds before it comes off cooldown. Samira can only cast Flair while dashing, her other abilities are buffered and will cast at the end of the dash. Casting Flash during Wild Rush will interrupt the dash but deal damage to nearby enemies at the location. If Flair was cast during this time, an explosive will also be placed at that location.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Inferno Trigger.

costtype.value: Mana + 6 Style

description.value: Active: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, rapidly shooting at all nearby enemies every 0.2 seconds over 2 seconds, slowing herself by 25% and dealing physical damage with each shot, reduced by 75% against minions.

leveling.value: Physical Damage Per Shot:»10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 (+ 60% AD)«Total Damage Per Target:»100 / 150 / 200 / 250 / 300 (+ 600% AD)«Minion Damage Per Shot:»2.5 / 3.75 / 5 / 6.25 / 7.5 (+ 15% AD)«Total Damage Per Minion:25 / 37.5 / 50 / 62.5 / 75 (+ 150% AD)

description2.value: Each shot can critically strike for (100% +  25%) bonus physical damage and applies  life steal at full effectiveness.

description3.value: Inferno Trigger cannot be cast unless the Style cost is satisfied, and will reset the grade back to 0 stacks when the effect ends.

description4.value: Samira cannot attack nor cast Flair or Blade Whirl during Inferno Trigger, but she is still able to move. Inferno Trigger will end prematurely by all forms of interrupting crowd control.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Samira can only cast Inferno Trigger if targets are visible. She will fire at enemies even if she does not have sight of them. Inferno Trigger's area of effect is fixed around Samira. The self slow is unaffected by slow resist.* Spell shield will block the damage of one shot. Inferno Trigger does not end early if all targets get out of range. Inferno Trigger can be buffered 0.5 seconds before it becomes unsealed or off cooldown. A shot that critically strikes deals 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 (+ 120% AD) physical damage to non-minions, increased to 22.5 / 33.75 / 45 / 56.25 / 67.5 (+ 135% AD) with Infinity Edge. With 100%  critical strike chance, Inferno Trigger will deal 200 / 300 / 400 / 500 / 600 (+ 1200% AD) total physical damage per non-minion, increased to 225 / 337.5 / 450 / 562.5 / 675 (+ 1350% AD) with Infinity Edge. The bottom of the player's screen will have a fiery visual effect while Samira is at S rank and Inferno Trigger has at least one rank.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
